source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>Lest you forget, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, our task is to replenish the infirmary's stores of daily necessities─dining utensils, bedding, and the like. We thank you for your kind assistance.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、来訪感謝する。
必要なのは寝具や食器といった、記念病院の日用品だ。
ご用意いただけただろうか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you have the medical supplies we require, I should be glad to take them off your hands.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
此度、調達したいのは膿盆や包帯など、記念病院の医療品だ。
お願いできるだろうか。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As you will recall, rehabilitation aids such as walking sticks and wheelchairs are the order of the day.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
杖や車椅子など、記念病院の機能回復訓練用品を調達したい。
手伝ってもらえるだろうか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we are currently preparing to host a high tea for our patients. Your assistance in the way of supplies would be appreciated.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_003<tab>よくきてくれた、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
患者たちを笑顔にするべく、茶会を催そうと準備中でな。
ぜひ、貴殿の用意した茶会用品を用いたいのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab>Welcome, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, welcome. I believe I speak for all at Ser Vaindreau's Grace when I say we are always glad for your visit.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
たびたびこちらに顔を出してくれて、感謝する。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>依頼品を渡す（<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>：残り<var 20 E803 /var>回）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Charlemend.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>デュランデル伯爵に武具投影を行う

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>「お得意様取引」について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>デュランデル伯爵の信頼度について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>納品の条件と報酬について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>依頼品の入手方法

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>製作の「素材」の入手について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（製作編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（採掘・園芸編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（漁師編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Charlemend will come to trust you more and more, leading him to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品することで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>のあなたに対する信頼度は、
少しずつ上昇していきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Charlemend's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_001<tab>現在の信頼度は、依頼品リスト上部のゲージに表示され、
これが最大まで溜まることで、「信頼ランク」が上昇します。
なお、信頼ランクはハートマークの数で表現されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Charlemend and his past.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_002<tab>また、信頼ランクが上昇する際には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>にまつわる、
新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 70 or above.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_007_000<tab>納品は、アイテムの種類に応じたクラスになり、
そのクラスのレベルが70以上の場合、
納品することができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_007_001<tab>納品時、クラスのレベルが89以下の場合は、
レベル90時のスクリップ報酬の代わりに、
経験値報酬を得られます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_000<tab>依頼品リストのアイテムの入手方法を調べたい場合は、
サブコマンドやアイテムヘルプを活用しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_001<tab>「クラフター全般」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「製作方法を検索」を実行すると、
製作手帳が開き、製作レシピが表示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_002<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「採集方法を検索」を実行すると、
採集手帳が開き、採集場所が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_003<tab>「漁師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「入手場所の表示」を実行すると、
該当の魚を入手できる釣り場・漁場が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_102_003<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、
釣り餌に「<var 28 ((Item)) F26FDA01 /var>」を使うとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Charlemend fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Charlemend deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_004<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>へ納品できるアイテムは、
「クラフター全般」と「採掘師／園芸師」、「漁師」の3種になり、
それらはすべて「収集品」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Charlemend seeks may be purchased from Diana in front of Ser Vaindreau's Grace.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_003_000<tab>依頼品の製作に必要な素材は、
ここ蒼天街の「ルーシュマンド記念病院」前にいる、
「ダイアナ」から購入可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_000<tab>クラフターの製作品の「収集価値」は、
製作時に「品質」を高めることで、上昇します。
そのため、できるだけ品質を高めて完成させることが重要です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_002<tab>品質が上がるアクションに成功すると、
自身に「インナークワイエット」が付与されていきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_003<tab>To be deleted.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_004<tab>Stack as many of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_004<tab>できるだけ多くのインナークワイエットを蓄積させておき、
最後に「ビエルゴの祝福」などで、
一気に品質を上げてから完成させるといいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_005<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_005<tab>他にも、品質を上げるために有用なアクションは存在します。
慣れてきたら、いろいろと試して自分なりの製作パターンを、
模索してみるとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_000<tab>収集品採集アイテムを選ぶと、特殊なウィンドウが表示されます。
収集品採集用アクションを使い、
「収集価値」を上げてから、アイテムを採集します。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_001<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」で収集価値を上げるには、
アクション「集中検分」を使用したのち、「純化」を使用します。
これを繰り返し、収集品アイテムを採集してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_002<tab>より高い収集価値を狙う場合は、
装備を整えて、「獲得力」「技術力」を高めてみましょう。
収集品採集用アクションの効果が高くなります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_003<tab>「GP」が不足しているようであれば、
装備を整えて、「GPmax」を高めてみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_000<tab>水産物は釣った「魚のサイズ」が、
そのまま「収集価値」となります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_001<tab>収集品として求められている魚がいる釣り場へ行き、
アクション「収集品採集」を使い、釣りを開始しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_002<tab>From there, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_002<tab>アクション「ペーシェンスII」を使ったあと、
適切なフッキングアクションを選ぶことで、
大きな魚を狙うことができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_003<tab>サイズが思ったように上がらない場合は「技術力」を、
装備を整えて高めてみましょう。

Furthermore, Charlemend deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>また、納品するアイテムの入手方法については、
それぞれ以下の方法で調べることができます。

target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Charlemend upon successful delivery.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>それぞれの納品アイテムは「収集価値」が高いほど、
納品時の報酬を多く得ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Charlemend and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>「収集価値の上げ方について」知りたい時には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「『お得意様取引』について聞く」を選んで確認しましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Charlemend's trust.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品したことで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、あなたの事を信頼し始めました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Charlemend will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Charlemend's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about your new business partner.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>納品時に得られる「信頼度」の蓄積を示すゲージが、
最大まで溜まると、「信頼ランク」が上昇し、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Charlemend needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new business partner!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>また、1週間で最大6回まで納品することが可能です。
積極的に収集品の納品を行い、
信頼ランクを上昇させていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>今週分の納品権を、すべて消費しました。
（地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((日)) ((月)) ((火)) ((水)) ((木)) ((金)) ((土)) /var>曜日の<var 08 E0DB0D ((午後)) ((午前)) /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0102030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 01 /var>時に、納品権が付与されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_000<tab>Excellent, these necessities will serve our patients well. Cleanliness being of the essence, I will see to disinfecting these ere they are put to use. But first, a little inspection for good measure...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_000<tab>感謝する、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
入院患者の日用品は、常に清潔を保つ必要があると教わった。
貴殿の用意したものなら、問題はなかろうが……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>From metal receptacles to cloth bandages, medical equipment must be made to exacting standards. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>金属製の膿盆から柔らかな包帯に至るまで、
治療に用いられる医療品には、品質が求められると聞く。
だが、貴殿の用意したものならば……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_002<tab>Safety is paramount when it comes to rehabilitation, and any equipment used must be sturdy and durable. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_002<tab>機能回復訓練に使う品々には、安全性が求められる。
貴殿の用意してくれた品も、念のため確認させてほしい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_003<tab>In a snow-swept nation such as ours, nobles and commoners alike are partial to a steaming cup of tea served with sweets. These items will allow us to host an event that our patients will enjoy. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_003<tab>寒冷化の進むこの地では貴族も平民も、
熱い茶と甘い菓子を囲む、茶会を好むのだ。
患者たちが楽しめる品々を用意したいものだな。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_004<tab>Painting provides not only a means of relaxation, but rehabilitation besides. These supplies will allow our patients to enjoy the benefits of exercising their artistry as they continue their journey of healing. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_004<tab>患者たちが心身ともに健康になってこそ、完治と言えるだろう。
さまざまな文化や芸術、心安らぐ品に触れることで、
癒されながら治療に臨んでほしいと考えているのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_000<tab>Brought us some lye, have you? Excellent. The infirmary ever has need of soap, and this will make a goodly amount of the stuff. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_000<tab>感謝する、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
これが入院患者を清潔に保つ、石鹸のもとになると教わった。
貴殿の用意したものなら、きっと上質な石鹸になるであろう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>From metal receptacles to cloth bandages, medical equipment must be made of quality materials. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>金属製の膿盆から柔らかな包帯に至るまで、
治療に用いられる医療品には、素材にも品質が求められると聞く。
だが、貴殿の用意したものならば……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_002<tab>Safety is paramount when it comes to rehabilitation, and the materials used in any equipment must be sturdy and durable. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_002<tab>機能回復訓練に使う品々には、安全性が求められる。
素材になるものも、硬さとしなやかさを併せ持つものでないと、
患者たちがケガをしかねんが……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_003<tab>In a snow-swept nation such as ours, nobles and commoners alike are partial to a steaming cup of tea served with sweets. Using this ingredient, we can prepare a toothsome syrup that our patients will enjoy. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_003<tab>寒冷化の進むこの地では貴族も平民も、
熱い茶と甘い菓子を囲む、茶会を好むのだ。
貴殿の素材で、甘味シロップを作りたいのだが……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_004<tab>Painting provides not only a means of relaxation, but rehabilitation besides. With this ingredient, we can prepare colors for our patients to use in their artistic endeavors. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_004<tab>絵画は、楽しみながらも手指を動かす訓練になり、
心の癒やしにも良い効果を与えると聞いてな。
貴殿の素材で、絵の具を作りたいと思っているのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>Brought us a scallop, have you? Excellent. The infirmary ever has need of soap, and the powder obtained from its shell will make a goodly amount of the stuff. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>感謝する、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
この貝の殻を砕き、石鹸のもとにすると教わった。
貴殿の用意したものなら、きっと上質な石鹸になるであろう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_001<tab>Ah, yes, from this variety of kelp, we can distill an extract with potent disinfecting properties─that is, assuming the specimen is sufficiently lush. Let us take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_001<tab>この海藻は、殺菌効果を擁しているらしい。
抽出するにはそれなりの品質が求められると聞くが、
貴殿の用意したものならば……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_002<tab>Rehabilitation is all too often a painful process, but from this frog's poison, we can concoct a medicine that effectively dulls pain. Now, if I might take a closer look at the critter...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_002<tab>機能回復訓練は、ときに痛みを伴うという。
だが、このカエルが有する毒を加工した鎮痛薬があれば……
貴殿が採ってきたものは、大いに役立つはずだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_003<tab>I am told that, in the Far East, it is customary to burn incense when drinking tea. Using such delightful seashells as incense burners, we can fill the room with a soothing scent. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_003<tab>東方では、茶会の折に香を焚くと聞いてな。
患者たちのための茶会でも、この貝を使った香合を用い、
心穏やかになる香りを演出しようと思うのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_004<tab>Ah, yes, this fish is considered a delicacy even among nobility. As tasty as it is nutritious, it will allow us to prepare meals that nourish the body even as it pleases the palate. Now, if I might take a closer look...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_004<tab>患者たちが心身ともに健康になってこそ、完治と言えるだろう。
院内の食事ひとつをとっても、香りのよいものを摂り、
癒されながら治療に臨んでほしいと考えているのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>Hm, yes, nothing to be desired. You are true to your reputation, my friend.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>……うむ！
品質も言うことなしだな！
さすがは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿だ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>Hm-hm, even to my layman's eyes, 'tis plain the quality is superior. Maelie will surely be pleased.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>……うむ！
職人の技には疎い私にでも、上質であるとわかるぞ！
マエリ殿も喜ぶであろう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab>By the Fury, even to my layman's eyes, 'tis plain the quality is transcendent! I cannot show this to Maelie soon enough!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab>おお……！
職人の技には疎い私にでも、まぎれもない逸品とわかるぞ！
マエリ殿にもはやく見せてやらねば！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_003<tab>Hm, yes, very fine stuff indeed! This will be a high tea to remember, mark my words!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_003<tab>これは、茶会を催すのに最適な品だな！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿の用意してくれた品で、
必ずや患者の喜ぶ茶会にしてみせようぞ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab>Hm, yes, very fine stuff indeed! It will help to bring a touch of joy to our patients' lives!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab>貴殿の用意してくれた品は、
そんな思いを十二分に叶えてくれる品だ！
感謝する、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>所持品に空きがないため、信頼ランク上昇の報酬を、
受け取ることができません。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Charlemend once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>所持品を空けてから、<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>With this latest contribution, we now have the requisite amount of necessities. You have my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>うむ、日用品はこれだけあればよいだろう。
十分に用立ててくれて感謝する。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_000<tab>Thanks to you, we now have all the medical supplies we require at present. A moment while I summon Maelie hither.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_000<tab>医療品の調達、感謝する。
ちょうどよかった、数もそろったことだし、
マエリ殿も呼んでくることにしよう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_000<tab>We now have enough equipment for our patients' rehabilitation. Next, we must learn how to assist them through the process.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_000<tab>これだけあれば、機能回復訓練も滞りなく行えるであろう。
あとは我々が、患者たちへの補助の仕方を教わらねばな……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>Thanks to you, we now have everything we require. 'Tis time to prepare the venue for the high tea. Come, let us go and put smiles on our patients' faces.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>さあさあ、さっそく茶会の準備をするとしよう！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿も来てくれ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_000<tab>Is it true? We have enough daily necessities now?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_000<tab>入院患者さんの日用品、もう集まったって本当！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>That we do, and we owe it to our industrious friend.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>ああ、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿が用立ててくれたのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_002<tab>Wonderful! Now our patients have everything they need! Thank you so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_002<tab>わぁ、すごい！
これなら、いつでもぴかぴかの生活ができそうだね！
さっすが、<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_003<tab>So much, indeed... I must confess, I was surprised to see how much is needed simply to provide our patients with a basic level of comfort.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_003<tab>ふむ、それにしても……。
治療に関わらない日用品でも、人ひとり生きるためには、
こんなにも多くの物資が必要なのだな……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_004<tab>All these things need replacin' too, so we'll need to keep makin' more. Just like we do at the orphanage.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_004<tab>こういうのは「しょうもう品」だから、
これからも、もっともっと必要なんだよ！
あればあるだけ使うから、孤児院でも作れるものは作ってたの。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_005<tab>Truly? You make everything you need by yourselves?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_005<tab>そ、そうか……。
家では常に補充されていたから、気づかなんだ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_006<tab>Well, sure. Most things anyway. I mean, who else is goin' to do it for us? Same with the cleanin'─we do that ourselves too.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_006<tab>じゃあ誰かがやってくれてたのね。
おじさんってば、お勉強はできるのに、
生活のことは、なんにも知らないんだから！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_007<tab>Ooh, I know! Next time, I'll teach you how to clean. Dustin' and moppin' and all that. We have to do these things regularly. After all, cleanliness is next to healthiness!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_007<tab>じゃあ、今度マエリがお洗濯やお掃除の仕方を教えてあげるね。
「しょうもう品」でも丁寧に使ってあげれば、長持ちするんだよ！
そしたら病院の人たちみんな、いつもきれいで過ごせるから！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_008<tab>I should be grateful for your tutelage, child.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_008<tab>ああ、感謝するマエリ殿。
ぜひ教えてくれ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_009<tab>Such devotion to her duty...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_009<tab>マエリ殿は、常に病院のことを第一に考えておるのだな……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>...So, taking <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s contributions into account, how long will the supplies last?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>さあ、マエリ殿。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿の品々が加わったことで、
幾日くらい在庫が保たれるかわかるだろうか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_002<tab>Um, if we add that to what we already have, that should give us...three weeks!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_002<tab>うーんと……。
いまあるものと足して、一日に使う数で割って……
三週間は大丈夫なはず！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_003<tab>Correct yet again! Your numbers have improved in leaps and bounds.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_003<tab>ああ、正解だ！
マエリ殿、ずいぶんと複雑な計算ができるようになったな。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_004<tab>That's thanks to your lessons. You make it easy <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> fun to learn.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_004<tab>おじさんが、わかりやすく教えてくれるおかげだよ！
いつもありがとう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_005<tab>Oh, and I've learned how to dress a wound as well! Maurilette taught me!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_005<tab><var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>が用意してくれたもので、
私たちもモリレットさんから、消毒の仕方を教わったの！
ありがとう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_006<tab>Maelie is truly a fast learner. It doubtless stems from her fervent desire to help others.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_006<tab>ああ、マエリ殿は私よりずっと飲み込みが早くてな。
他者のことを一番に思う心持ちの違いが、
上達の差になっているのだろう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_007<tab>While I do not want for the selfsame desire, the old hound that I am, 'tis all I can do to keep up.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_007<tab>学ぶことが多くてありがたいが、
その、少し複雑な気分だ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_000<tab>Have you heard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Maurilette's goin' to teach us how to help our patients! With their rehabilitation, that is!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>！
<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>のおかげで品質のいいものが揃ったから、
モリレットさんが、訓練のお手伝いの仕方を教えてくれるって！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_001<tab>...What's wrong? You have a stomachache or somethin'?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_001<tab>おじさん、どうしたの？
おなかいたいの？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_002<tab>No, no, nothing of the sort. It's just...I can't help but worry whether I will be able to assist our patients appropriately. What if they do not improve, or worse yet, end up suffering more pain?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_002<tab>いや、機能回復訓練は、苦痛を伴うのであろう？
そんな状況の患者たちを私が支えられるのかと、
及び腰になってしまってな……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_003<tab>Hmmm... You could try and imagine you're hurtin' in the same places. That way you'd know how they feel and can help them better.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_003<tab>うーん、そういうときはね、
自分も同じところが痛いって思って、助けてあげればいいんだよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_004<tab>Besides, we'll be there too, me and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. So don't worry. Everything will be fine!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_004<tab>それに、おじさんにはマエリと<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>がいるから、
大丈夫！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_005<tab>Yes... Yes, you have the right of it. I shall do as you say, and imagine their pain as mine own. Come, let us have Maurilette instruct us at once!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_005<tab>ああ、そうだなマエリ殿……！
相手の思いを常に慮ることを意識しながら、
さっそく、モリレット殿に教えてもらうことにしよう……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_000<tab>How're you feelin'? Enjoyin' yourself?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_000<tab>お兄さん、ぐあいはどうですか？
お茶会たのしい？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_PATIENT00710_004_001<tab>I am. I must say, I never thought it could be so pleasant at an infirmary. Thank you, Maelie.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_PATIENT00710_004_001<tab>ああ、病院でこんなに穏やかな時間が過ごせるとはね。
ありがとう、マエリちゃん。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_004_002<tab>I daresay the event is a success. We owe it to the two of you for conceiving of it and providing what was required.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_004_002<tab>シャルルマンさんの発案と、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの用意のおかげね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_003<tab>Full glad am I to see our patients so enjoying themselves. Long as many of them must stay here, what little additional comfort we can provide goes a long way. And as an unexpected benefit...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_003<tab>楽しんでもらえたようでなによりだ。
長期の療養ゆえ、少しでも過ごしやすい方がよいものな。
それに……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_STAFF00710_004_004<tab>You helped with the preparations as well, did you not? Thank you, Ronantain. You've a good heart.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_STAFF00710_004_004<tab>ロナンタンくんも、お茶会の準備を手伝ってくれたのよね。
どうもありがとう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_004_005<tab>Well, I scarcely did anything...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_004_005<tab>いや、僕はたいしたことは……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_006<tab>...It served to break down the barriers to which my nephew had clung.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_006<tab>まるで、いつかの自分のようだった甥も、
みなと打ち解けられたようで、安心した。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_100<tab>Allow me to thank you all for replenishing the daily necessities. It shall keep us for a good while.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_100<tab>ふたりとも、それに<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
患者さんたちの日用品を調達してくれてありがとう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_101<tab>And with Charlemend tutoring Maelie while managing our stores, my fellow nurses and I find our burden greatly lightened. All of which is to say you are doing well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_101<tab>シャルルマンさんが、
マエリちゃんに勉強を教えながら、日用品を管理してくれて、
私たちも、とても助かっているわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_102<tab>That being the case, I have a mind to task you with replenishing and managing our medical supplies as well. Do you think you will be up to the task?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_102<tab>皆さんがとても真面目に仕事をしてくれるので、
もう少し高度な、医療品の管理もお願いしようと思うの。
いいかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_103<tab>Yes, Maurilette! Just leave it to us!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_103<tab>任せてください！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_104<tab>You heard that, Charlemend? We're in charge of medical supplies now!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_104<tab>やったね、おじさん！
私たち、奉仕職員として成長できてるのかな！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_105<tab>'Tis testament to your dedication. Let us keep up our fine form.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_105<tab>ああ、貴殿のおかげだ。
引き続き尽力しよう、マエリ殿。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_106<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there is none we trust more to provide what we need. May we rely upon you once more?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_106<tab>そして<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
貴殿の用意するものが最も信用できる。
引き続き、調達の助力を願えるだろうか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_100<tab>I took the liberty of inspecting our inventory, and I'm pleased to say that all is in good order. The two of you are doing a fine job of managing the medical supplies.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_100<tab>シャルルマンさん、マエリちゃん。
医療品の扱いも手慣れてきたわね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_101<tab>Hehe, that's because Charlemend's been teachin' me my numbers!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_101<tab>計算を教えてくれるおじさんと、
使いやすいものを用意してくれる<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>のおかげ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_102<tab>I certainly see you teaching Maelie often of late. A more zealous tutor one would be hard-pressed to find.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_102<tab>ええ、最近シャルルマンさんが、
マエリちゃんにつきっきりで勉強を教えているのをよく見るわ。
ずいぶん、気にかけてくださっているのね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_103<tab>Yes, well, one might say 'tis a force of habit.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_103<tab>うむ、その……。
私には、マエリ殿と同じ年頃の甥がいてな。
無意識に彼と姿を重ねてしまうのやもしれぬ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_104<tab>I have a nephew, you see─a boy of an age with Maelie─and I daresay I see him in her.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_104<tab>弟は戦死し、息子は行方知れずのまま……。
ゆえに甥は家督を継ぐ者として、教えることがたくさんあった。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_105<tab>With my brother passed and firstborn lost, I took him under my wing as my successor, teaching him such knowledge as he needs to one day lead our knights in battle against the dragons.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_105<tab>星を読み、竜との戦いの先頭に立って民を守ることこそが、
我らの在るべき姿だと。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_106<tab>Yet now that the Dragonsong War has ended, we must dedicate ourselves not to the taking of life, but the bettering of it.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_106<tab>だが、千年戦争が終結したいまは、
皇都の発展と市民の豊かな生活のために尽力するべきなのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_107<tab>However, not all of our countrymen have embraced change. And as a father figure to my nephew, I felt that I must needs practice that which I preach.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_107<tab>しかし、急激な時代の変化についていけないのも仕方ないこと。
そこで父の代わりであり、師でもある私が、
手本を見せてやらねばならぬ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_108<tab>Leading by example, I wished to give him a glimpse of a new Ishgard, one where there is no highborn and lowborn─just fellow Ishgardians striving together for a better tomorrow.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_108<tab>奉仕職員を志望したのは、身分問わずに民が一丸となって、
新たな時代の皇都を生きていく……
そんな手本になりたかったからなのだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_109<tab>By that, I must confess that I do not have only the interests of the patients in mind. 'Twas wrong of me not to disclose this fact from the first, and I beg your forgiveness.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_109<tab>いま思えば、それは打算的な考えであるな。
私は奉仕職員失格やもしれぬ。
すまない、モリレット殿。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_110<tab>No apologies are necessary, Charlemend. Whatever your reasons, you've been naught but an asset to the infirmary. You and Maelie both.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_110<tab>いいえ、シャルルマンさん。
思いの丈を正直に話してくれてありがとう。
あなたは奉仕職員として、ふさわしい働きをしてくれているわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_111<tab>Thus do I have a mind to entrust the two of you with even more responsibilities.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_111<tab>だから、そんなシャルルマンさんとマエリちゃんに、
またもう少し大きな仕事を任せたいわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_112<tab>Many of our patients have debilitating injuries, and are in need of rehabilitation. I want you to assist them in their efforts. This is an important task, one that requires you to work closely with the patients.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_112<tab>次はね、ケガをした患者さんたちが、
機能回復訓練をするお手伝いをしてほしいの。
患者さんたちと接する、重要なお仕事よ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_113<tab>Now, rehabilitation demands a variety of sophisticated equipment, such that can only be provided by skilled artisans. To wit, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must turn to you once more.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_113<tab>機能回復訓練には、高度な道具が必要なの。
一流の職人さんにしか頼めないんだけど、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、お願いできるかしら？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_100<tab>Not only did the event unfold smoothly─by participating in it, my nephew has begun to warm to the idea of a new Ishgard. I couldn't have asked for a better outcome.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
貴殿のおかげで、無事に茶会も開催できた。
甥の心持ちも多少変わったようだし、なによりだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_101<tab>Going forward, 'tis my intent to host high teas on a regular basis, meaning we will continue to require the relevant supplies. I hope you will keep obliging us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─with those items as well as the usual necessities.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_101<tab>これからも定期的に開催できればと考えている。
日用品も備品も引き続き必要だし、できれば、
患者がより過ごしやすくなる品々も用意したいところだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_102<tab>Hehe, you really like workin' here, don't you?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_102<tab>おじさんも、病院のお手伝いが大好きなんだね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_103<tab>If truth be told, I had not expected to enjoy myself so. I never would have known this were it not for you and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_103<tab>ああ、これもすべてマエリ殿と、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿のおかげだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_104<tab>And with matters at home laid to rest, I may continue doing my part here with an easy heart.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_104<tab>家の心配事についても、少しは肩の荷が下りてきた。
私は引き続きこの病院で奉仕職員として働き、
マエリ殿たちから多くのことを学ばせてほしい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_105<tab>I trust that you will continue to be at my side, Maelie─as a fellow aide and mentor both.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_105<tab>これからも、同志として師として、
ともにいてくれないだろうか、マエリ殿？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_106<tab>Oh, you can count on it! It's great fun workin' together, and I learn so much from you as well!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_106<tab>もちろん！
私もおじさんからもっとお勉強教えてほしいし、
いっしょにお仕事するの、とっても楽しいもの！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_107<tab>And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We are indebted to you more than words can well express.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_107<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿には、
本当にたびたび世話になったな。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_108<tab>You have done all of us at Ser Vaindreau's Grace a great service, and I pray that you will continue to lend us your expertise.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_108<tab>これからも私は、ここで奉仕職員として邁進するつもりだ。
貴殿の協力があれば、非常に助かる。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_109<tab>Speaking of which...there is one other favor I had been meaning to ask of you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_109<tab>あと、それとだな……。
ずっと言い出せなかったのだが……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_110<tab>Though I have been disguising myself─leastwise, that was my intent─I have failed to fool a single person.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_110<tab>正体を隠すために変装していたわけだが、
私を知る者には、ひと目で見抜かれていたであろう？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_111<tab>As such, I shall shed with disguises, and strive instead to dress in a manner that would better endear myself to citizens and patients both. Whenever you have a spare moment, I would greatly appreciate your insights on outfits.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_111<tab>ゆえに、今後は市民や患者たちに親しみを持たれるような服装を、
信頼のおける貴殿に見立ててもらいたいのだ。
暇のあるときにでも、よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Charlemend is pleased with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Able Associate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「奉仕職員の協力者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Charlemend is delighted with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Avid Assistant<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「奉仕職員の助っ人」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Charlemend is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Ardent Ally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「奉仕職員の僚友」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Charlemend could not be happier with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Attentive Angel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「奉仕職員の盟友」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if he is to atone for past negligence and provide a shining example for the future of Ishgard. To that end, Charlemend has a new favor to ask of you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、
引き続き、あなたの手助けを必要としているようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, the patients of Ser Vaindreau's Grace have never enjoyed better conditions. It seems, however, that Charlemend has a different sort of favor to ask of you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、
あなたに、新たな依頼をお願いしたいようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Charlemend has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Charlemend and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「依頼品を渡す」を選んで確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Charlemend's efforts at Ser Vaindreau's Grace is now available from Maurilette. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Charlemend will be updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>お得意様取引のストーリークエストが発行されました。
ルーシュマンド記念病院の「モリレット」から受注できます。
クエストをコンプリートすることで、納品リストが更新されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>Future requests will be selected at random from all those you have seen thus far, with the list refreshed once a week (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>今後の依頼は、一週間に一度、
これまでの依頼品の中からランダムで選ばれます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab>You may review the items currently in demand at any time by speaking with Charlemend and selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「依頼品を渡す」を選んで確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>Note that art supplies, art supply materials, and fragrant sweetfish will earn you particularly handsome rewards. Whenever they make an appearance, the effort to procure them will be worth your while.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>なお「記念病院の絵画道具」「絵画道具の素材」、
「薫香魚」については、多くの報酬が得られます。
リストに含まれていた場合は、積極的に納品してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>Furthermore, Charlemend's appearance may now be altered through the use of glamours.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>また、以後デュランデル伯爵に、
武具投影を行うことができるようになりました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_000<tab>Thanks for bringin' us so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>！
たくさん用意してくれてありがとうー！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>Indeed. 'Tis in no small part due to your contributions that we budding aides are able to discharge our duties. We are truly grateful.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>ああ、我々が奉仕職員として認められているのは、
貴殿が良い品質の物資を用意してくれるおかげだ。
感謝している、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_000<tab>Thanks so much for always helpin' us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>！
いつもお手伝いしてくれて、ありがとうー！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>With your kind assistance, we are being entrusted with tasks of ever greater import. We hope we can continue to depend on you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>我々も少しずつ、
奉仕職員として大きな仕事を任され始めている。
邁進していくゆえ、引き続き協力を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>I'm pleased to say that our patients have been making excellent progress with their rehabilitation. And in the course of working together, I have managed to strike up a rapport with many of them.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
貴殿のおかげで、患者たちの回復も順調だ。
私自身、彼らに声をかけることにも慣れてきたぞ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_001<tab>Just earlier, Maurilette told us that we're fully fledged aides now! But we won't rest on these laurels, oh no. We'll keep workin' as hard as ever!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_001<tab>この前ね、モリレットさんが私たちのこと、
「もう一人前の奉仕職員ね」って言ってたよ！
これからも患者さんたちのために、がんばらなくっちゃ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_000<tab>Not in a very long time have I had the opportunity to learn so much. It makes me feel like a young man again.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
引き続きの協力、本当に感謝する。
おかげで私は、学びの多い日々を送っておる。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_001<tab>Ronantain's been learnin' a lot too. Haven't you, Ronantain?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_001<tab>最近は、ロナンタンくんも、
ずっとお手伝いしてくれてるんだよね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_004_002<tab>A-Aye, well, I but follow my uncle's example.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_004_002<tab>別に、伯父上の姿勢にならっているだけさ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_003<tab>It does me well to see the younger generation embrace change. After all, 'tis they who shall lead Ishgard unto the future. Not to say that I won't do my part, but I must work hard if I am to keep up with their youthful vigor!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_003<tab>若い世代にも、新たな価値観が根づいているようでなによりだ。
私もまだしばらくは現役ゆえ、負けてはいられぬ！
人生、日々勉強であるな。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_005_000<tab>Not only has my nephew grown accustomed to assisting here─it pleases me to say he takes to the work with great zeal.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_005_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
絶えずの協力、まことに感謝する。
甥もずいぶん、ここでの手伝いに慣れてきたようだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_005_001<tab>We have to wash the bedsheets next! Let's go, Ronantain!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_005_001<tab>ロナンタンくん、向こうで患者さんのシーツお洗濯しないと！
はやく行こう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_005_002<tab>A-All right!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_005_002<tab>ああ、待ってくれよ！
すぐに行くから！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_000<tab>I've not forgotten that you are a busy <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I am truly grateful that you should see fit to lend us so much of your assistance, and not only here at the infirmary.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
まさか貴殿がここまで協力してくれるとは思わなんだ。
忙しい身であろうに……心から感謝する。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_001<tab>Among other things, House Durendaire owes much of her newfound prosperity to you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_001<tab>貴殿のおかげで、
我が家のこともずいぶんと安定したように思う。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_002<tab>Your coming and subsequent ending of the Dragonsong War wrought great changes. Changes that many Ishgardians─myself among them─struggled to accept.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_002<tab>貴殿の訪れにより戦争が終結し、価値観が一変し、
その奔流に押し流されて歯がゆく思うこともあったが……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_003<tab>But I believe I speak for an ever-growing number of my countrymen when I say we appreciate all that you have done, and continue to do, for our nation.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_003<tab>いまではすべての変化を含め、貴殿の関わりに感謝している。
皇都と、そして私の人生の岐路に貴殿がいたことは、
まことに僥倖であった。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_004<tab>On behalf of all Ishgardians, I give you my humblest thanks.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_004<tab>感謝する、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Charlemend. You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>今週分の<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>への納品権を、すべて消費しました。
（地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((日)) ((月)) ((火)) ((水)) ((木)) ((金)) ((土)) /var>曜日の<var 08 E0DB0D ((午後)) ((午前)) /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0102030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 01 /var>時に、納品権が付与されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>...Hm? As much as battle attire becomes you, perhaps you should don something more suitable for our lesson with Maurilette.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>我々はこれから「モリレット」殿に、
機能回復訓練について教わるが……。
念のため貴殿も、ふさわしい装いの方が良いのではないか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to undertake the next quest, speak with Maurilette as a Disciple of the Hand or the Land.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>お得意様取引のストーリークエストを進行するためには、
現在のクラスがギャザラー、もしくはクラフターの必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_010<tab>Their pain as mine own, their pain as mine own...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_010<tab>機能回復訓練か……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Custom deliveries cannot be made while the quest “Those Who Serve” is in progress. They will become available again once the quest is completed.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>クエスト進行中はお得意様取引が行えなくなります。
再開するためには、クエスト「皇都の未来を担うため」の、
コンプリートが必要になりますので、ご注意ください。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_015<tab>I apologize for my nephew's outburst. He is a good lad, truly.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_015<tab>その、すまない……。
手数をかける。
